channel.title: Adding emotes
channel.description:
Well, I went to add emotes to my client, such as D claws, swh, vls, morrigans jav/axe, but it didn't seem to work, My animation.java file looks nothing like my friends client.
I'm using PI, a few people said slash client, but others said Galkon's enhanced. Someone said all the animations are packed, so if someone could help?
I will rep++ if you help me fix this, I have msn, Teamviewer, just message me.
pritchardthomas@yahoo.com
